info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

get.description: Get reward details in the context of a loyalty campaign and reward assignment ID.

200.description: Returns reward details in the context of a loyalty *campaign* and reward assignment ID.

LoyaltiesRewardAssignmentsRewardGetRespo.title: Loyalties Reward Assignments Reward Get Response Body

id.description: Unique reward ID, assigned by Voucherify.

stock.description: Configurable for **material rewards**. The number of units of the product that you want to share as reward.

redeemed.description: Defines the number of already invoked (successful) reward redemptions.

attributes.description: These properties are configurable for **material rewards**.

image_url.description: The HTTPS URL pointing to the .png or .jpg file.

description.description: An arbitrary string that you can attach to a material reward.

metadata.description: The metadata object stores all custom attributes assigned to the reward. A set of key/value pairs that you can attach to a reward object. It can be useful for storing additional information about the reward in a structured format.

parameters.description: Defines how the reward is generated.

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the reward was created. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the reward was updated. The value is shown in the ISO 8601 format.

object.description: The type of the object represented by the JSON. This object stores information about the reward.

campaign.description: Objects stores information about the campaign related to the reward.

id.description: Unique campaign ID, assigned by Voucherify.

balance.description:
The number of points to be added to a loyalty card or the amount to be added to the current balance on the gift card.

For gift cards, the value is multiplied by 100 to precisely represent 2 decimal places. For example, $100 amount is written as 10000.

coin.description: Defines the ratio by mapping the number of loyalty points in points_ratio to a predefined cash amount in exchange_ratio.

exchange_ratio.description: The cash equivalent of the points defined in the points_ratio property.

points_ratio.description: The number of loyalty points that will map to the predefined cash amount defined by the exchange_ratio property.

product.description: Contains information about the product given as a reward.

id.description: Unique product ID, assigned by Voucherify.

sku_id.description: Unique SKU ID, assigned by Voucherify, of the SKU given as a reward.
